dmca.title: [AB-C33908H] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice
dmca.body:
Please re-send your complaint since there was not an attachment with this e-mail. Thank you, Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Tuesday, June 27, 2006 9:29 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [AB-C33908H] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Subject: [AB-C33908H] Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Reference: [AB-C33908H] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Added by system at Saturday, Jun 24 2006 09:25 pm X-MailFrom: ron@ronwainscottphotography.com X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com Received: from [172.16.214.181] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for ; Sat Jun 24 21:25:53 2006 Return-path: Delivery-date: Sat, 24 Jun 2006 21:25:53 -0500 Received: from mail.inside.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.110] helo=mail.theplanet.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from ron@ronwainscottphotography.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1FuKJt-000ILi-8Q for abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com; Sat, 24 Jun 2006 21:25:53 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from ron@ronwainscottphotography.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1FuKJs-0004vL-3o for abuse@theplanet.com; Sat, 24 Jun 2006 21:25:52 -0500 Received: from web310.biz.mail.mud.yahoo.com ([68.142.199.186]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from ron@ronwainscottphotography.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1FuKJr-000ILR-PL for abuse@theplanet.com; Sat, 24 Jun 2006 21:25:51 -0500 Received: (qmail 74282 invoked by uid 60001); 25 Jun 2006 02:25:51 -0000 Message-ID: <20060625022551.74280.qmail@web310.biz.mail.mud.yahoo.com> Received: from [209.102.128.154] by web310.biz.mail.mud.yahoo.com via HTTP; Sat, 24 Jun 2006 19:25:51 PDT Date: Sat, 24 Jun 2006 19:25:51 -0700 (PDT) From: Ron Wainscott Subject: Cease & Desist / DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice To: whois@swelldeal.com, abuse@theplanet.com, copyright@theplanet.com, legal@theplanet.com, webinfo@swelldeal.com MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="0-798392450-1151202351=:71520" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 68.142.199.186 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of ronwainscottphotography.com) client-ip=68.142.199.186; envelope-from=ron@ronwainscottphotography.com; helo=web310.biz.mail.mud.yahoo.com; (multipart/mixed) (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) I am the photographer and copyright owner of all images contained on the website http://www.dawnavril.com Attached is a DMCA complaint in regards to the website http://www.uselessjunk.net using my copyrighted images without permission. Ron Wainscott Photography does not tolerate copyright infringement and will prosecute anyone involved in this illegal activity (including the host of the site) to the fullest extent of the law. It would be in your best interest to remove the link mentioned in the attached complaint as well as any other images from DawnAvril.com immediately. Failure to do so will result in copyright infringement charges being filed against anyone and everyone involved with the operation of uselessjunk.net. Your immediate attention to this matter is required. Ron Wainscott (251) 967-4226 MIME element (text/html) I am the photographer and copyright owner of all images contained on the website http://www.dawnavril.com

Attached is a DMCA complaint in regards to the website http://www.uselessjunk.net using my copyrighted images without permission.

Ron Wainscott Photography does not tolerate copyright infringement and will prosecute anyone involved in this illegal activity (including the host of the site) to the fullest extent of the law.

It would be in your best interest to remove the link mentioned in the attached complaint as well as any other images from DawnAvril.com immediately.  Failure to do so will result in copyright infringement charges being filed against anyone and everyone involved with the operation of uselessjunk.net.  Your immediate attention to this matter is required.

Ron Wainscott
(251) 967-4226
